description: Ready to slap on the skins and leave the lift lines behind, the Reduxion™ is Mountain Hardwear's quintessential softshell ski touring pant, ideal for drier continental climates and high-exertion days in the backcountry. This dynamic pant features durable, four-way stretch woven fabric with zippered side vents to easily dump heat on the skin track.
name: Mountain Hardwear Reduxion Softshell Pants, Short - Mens
